name: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Confrontation
description:
SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Confrontation is an action-shooter game developed by Slant Six Games. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Confrontation is available on PlayStation 3.
Justin Burnett scored the game.
